privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how we protect your personal data.
privacy.intro: FIVE Consulting values your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.description: We collect data such as name, email, phone, and professional information that you voluntarily provide when contacting us or subscribing to our newsletter.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
usage.description: We use your data to provide services, respond to requests, send relevant content, improve your experience, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
sharing.description: Your data is not shared with third parties, except when necessary for the performance of services or by legal requirement.

security.title: 4. Information Security
security.description: We adopt strict security practices to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your Browse, personalize content, and analyze traffic. You can manage your preferences in our cookie banner.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.description: In accordance with the LGPD, you can access, correct, or request the deletion of your data. Contact us at contato@fiveconsulting.com.br.

changes.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this policy periodically. The current version will always be available on this page.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: Check the terms and conditions for using our site and services.
terms.intro: These Terms of Use govern the access and use of this site and our services. By using any feature, you agree to these terms.

usageLicense.title: 1. License to Use
usageLicense.description: You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use our services according to these terms.
usageLicense.termination: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access for violating these terms.

disclaimer.title: 2. Disclaimer of Liability
disclaimer.description: The services are provided 'as is', without express or implied warranties.
items: We do not guarantee continuous availability
We are not liable for indirect damages
We do not guarantee the full accuracy of the content
We may change the services at any time
disclaimer.termination: We are not liable for damages arising from the use or inability to use our services.

limitations.title: 3. Limitations of Use
limitations.description: By using our services, you agree not to:
limitations.termination: Non-compliance may result in immediate suspension of services and legal action.

accuracy.title: 4. Accuracy of Information
accuracy.description: We strive to keep the information updated and correct.
items: Content may be changed without prior notice
accuracy.termination: We do not guarantee that all information is free of errors or completely up-to-date.

links.title: 5. External Links
links.description: Our site may contain links to third-party sites.
items: We have no control over external sites
We are not responsible for third-party content
We recommend reading the terms of external sites
links.termination: We disclaim any liability for damages caused by third-party content or services.

changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
changes.description: These Terms of Use may be modified at any time. Changes take effect immediately upon being posted on this page. It is your responsibility to review them periodically.
changes.termination: Continued use of the services after changes indicates your acceptance of the updated terms.

governingLaw.title: 7. Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms are governed by Brazilian laws.
items: Exclusive jurisdiction in the district of São Paulo, SP
governingLaw.termination: Any disputes will be resolved in the jurisdiction of São Paulo, Brazil.
